def.name: FINE-HEAD
def.comment: Returns the substring with whitespace normalized by stripping leading whitespace
def.repeat: DUP OVER C@ IS-WHITE SWAP CHAR+ SWAP CHAR-

forth.def: Returns the substring with whitespace normalized by stripping trailing whitespace OVER + 2DUP eq DROP 0 CHAR- DUP C@ IS-WHITE 0eq CHAR+ OVER -

def.name: SPLIT-WHITE-FORCE
def.ds: c-addr u -- c-addr-left u-left c-addr-right u-right

forth.def:
2DUP OVER + SWAP 2DUP eq DROP NIP 0 SWAP 0 DUP CHAR+ SWAP C@ IS-WHITE CHAR-
DUP >R - DUP >R - 2R>

def.name: -SPLIT-WHITE-FORCE
def.ds: c-addr u -- c-addr-left u-left c-addr-right u-right

forth.def:
2DUP CHARS OVER + 2DUP eq DROP NIP 0 SWAP 0 CHAR- DUP SWAP C@ IS-WHITE CHAR+
TUCK >R - TUCK - R> SWAP

def.ds: a u -- a u1 a-rest u-rest
